events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to manage your application.
We conducted an initial screening of your profile to assess your experience with software engineering tasks.
Thank you for the update. I am excited about this opportunity and eager to proceed to the next stages.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and your skills aligned well with our software engineering requirements.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you showed great alignment with our company's values and team dynamics.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer role including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity and am enthusiastic about joining your engineering team.
I am happy to formally accept the offer and look forward to contributing as a software engineer.
Onboarding has commenced, and you have been given access to our development tools and documentation.
The recruitment process is now complete. Welcome aboard as the newest member of our engineering team.
